name: Amzer
description:
Growth your plant to the outside in this experimental game

Left click - choose somewhere to go
Right click - remove the last change

WARNING : YOU NEED WebGl FOR HTML VERSION
OTHERWISE YOU WILL HAVE TO DOWNLOAD IT

if it doens't work but you have WebGl --> Use Ccleaner, clean all the browser and try again


Music - "New Rooms New Places" by Lobo Loco
Art - "old" art from Trixelized
Code and others - Shynif
